message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $120 to me, but I understand its value might be different for you. I'm willing to start the negotiation at $100. Let me know if this is within your budget or if you'd like to propose a counteroffer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I've done some research and I'm not sure the product is worth more than that to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective on the product's value. I would like to counter your offer by suggesting a price of $95 for the product. This allows us both to feel satisfied with the transaction. Please let me know if this proposal works for you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still not convinced the product is worth more than $80 to me. I'd like to propose a price of $80 again. I'm willing to walk away if we can't agree on a price.

I respect your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to lower my price to $85 for the product. This still allows me to cover my costs and maintain a reasonable profit margin. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and we can move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay more than $80 for the product. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle, so I'm reiterating my offer of $80. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your patience throughout this negotiation. In light of our previous discussions, I am prepared to offer the product at $82.50. This price allows us to meet somewhere in the middle while still ensuring a fair return for me. I hope this proposal is acceptable and we can finalize the transaction.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not willing to pay more than $80 for the product. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price. If not, I'll have to consider other options.

After careful consideration, I am willing to accept a price of $81 for the product. This allows us to reach an agreement that respects both of our positions. I hope this proposal is satisfactory and we can conclude the transaction.

Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still not willing to pay more than $80 for the product. I'm at my limit, so I'm reiterating my final offer of $80. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $80.
